name: Drop Kick Zombie!
detailed_description:
Have you ever wanted to see a zombie loli punting human lolis in the name of justice? Great!

Drop Kick Zombie! is a fast-paced score-driven action game wherein you use your zombified claws to rack up damage on your targets before drop kicking them for massive points.

  • 2-button control scheme that anyone can pick up and play.
  • Nuanced mechanics and a granular scoring system support a high skill ceiling.
  • 3 game modes to provide variety and encourage a true mastery of the mechanics.

short_description: An arcade-style action game about a zombie who drop kicks lolis.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ or probably something mac/linux idk
  • Processor: if it runs win7 or later i think you're good
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: like none
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a working one
  • Additional Notes: without vsync i get like 10000 fps it's a simple game
